resources.string: Warning!\nRevoking most permissions will most likely cause apps to malfunction. If an app with revoked permissions force-closes please grant the expected permissions or don\'t use the app.

Warning!

Disabling validation and enforcement of security policy on your device may violate your corporate policy or email hosting agreement!

Are you sure you want to disable this security check?
Select the type of phone numbers you want to filter
When to start filtering outgoing calls
When to end filtering outgoing calls
Select which way the confirmation should be requested before filtering the communication
Level of the math problems asked before authorizing a communication
Phone Goggles is enabled for this app
Communications to mobile phones will be filtered
Communications to other phones will be filtered
Phone Goggles is disabled for this app
Professional communications will not be filtered
No communications to mobile phones will be filtered
No communications to other phones will be filtered
Use haptic feedback on keypress for softkeys and certain UI interactions
No haptic feedback on keypress for softkeys and certain UI interactions
Use haptic feedback on key release for softkeys and certain UI interactions
No haptic feedback on key release for softkeys and certain UI interactions
Use haptic feedback when making screen selections
No haptic feedback when making screen selections
REBOOT REQUIRED FOR CHANGES TO APPLY GLOBALLY
Adjusting haptic values for button DOWN-PRESSES\n(Virtual hardkeys and certain UI interactions.)
Adjusting haptic values for button RELEASES\n(Virtual hardkeys and most screen presses.)
Adjusting haptic values for on-screen keyboard taps
Press the Plus or Minus Buttons to add or remove steps in the sequence.
Use custom instead of recent apps
Select action for long press menu
Tap on center color to confirm.\nPress back to cancel
Apply moving average filter to sensor data to reduce flicker.
Filtered value is the average sensor value during this period.
Samples deviating this much from current average resets the filter.
Low value can improve accuracy but uses some more CPU.
Brightness used to dim the screen
Enable to allow lights to decrease. Use hysteresis to reduce flicker.
Sensor levels overlap this much downwards.
Some colors only display on certain devices
This option has been proven to increase the amount of battery drain by ~3% per hour
Move buttons to left on status bar
Note: Some devices do reset when pressed together
When enabled, the slide lock appears if secure lock delay is longer
Lense hides all widgets except music
Are you sure you want to disable?
